selected_skills.name: count_objects
selected_skills.purpose: To count the total number of objects in the diagram and specific categories like brown blocks and large blue rubber things.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to count the objects in the image data after identifying them based on color and size.

new_skill_specs.name: identify_and_categorize_objects
new_skill_specs.purpose: To identify and categorize objects in an image based on specified categories such as color and size.
new_skill_specs.outputs: A dictionary with categories as keys and lists of identified objects as values.
edge_cases: Objects with similar colors but different sizes
